scripts.clean: npm run clean-cjs && npm run clean-es5-esm && npm run clean-es6-esm && npm run clean-umd
scripts.build-es5-esm: npm run clean-es5-esm && tsc -t es5 -m es6 --outDir lib-es5-esm
scripts.build-es6-esm: npm run clean-es6-esm && tsc -t es6 -m es6 --outDir lib-es6-esm
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-cjs && npm run build-es5-esm && npm run build-es6-esm
scripts.docs-publish: cd ./docs && rm -rf ./build && npm run build && GIT_USER=xledocteurx CURRENT_BRANCH=master USE_SSH=true npm run deploy
scripts.before-publish: npm install && npm run test && npm run build && zip -r -X ./docs/static/dist.zip ./dist
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public && npm run docs-publish
